meanings.definition: an enzyme in blood that helps with clotting
meanings.sent1: When a cut happens, thrombin rushes to the rescue to stop the bleeding.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use thrombin to help wounds heal faster.
meanings.sent3: Thrombin and its clotting friends throw a party whenever there's a boo-boo.
meanings.sent4: The body's repair crew, including thrombin, swiftly patches up any leaks in the blood vessel highway.
meanings.sent5: Imagine thrombin as a tiny superhero, swooping in to save the day by forming a protective shield over the wound.
